name: Get Good
description:
Get Good is a tough, rocket-jumping, platforming climb where you must use your hand rocket jumping powers to escape. Is the climb the reality? Or what's outside?, as you climb you may notice things start to change, colors, surroundings, and most of all, difficulty. The challenges here will push you to your limit. Do you have what it takes to make it back?

Features:
Twitch Integration! - See Twitch chat around your character as you move through the game.
Multiple Fun and challenging modes.
Extreme difficulty ( if you are a masochist and pride yourself on beating hard games).
A cute helper that follows you and encourages (or occasionally berates) you.

Modes

-Standard:
Climb your way to the top, as easy as that sounds, any setbacks will be endured, the game auto-saves so you can't reload a save after a failed jump.

-Chase
In addition to the regular climb, There is a mysterious entity chasing you. If it touches you, your character will be killed and reset.

-Death Chase
Not for the feint of heart, requires true mastery of the game to complete. The chaser is faster and if it touches you the entire run must be restarted from scratch.

-Endless
Climb endlessly against a treacherous terrain, with a shareable seed so you can share fun and interesting climbs and compete against friends!

-Target Test Trail
Break the targets as fast as possible and compete with your fastest times against others!

Your loyal follower Ayu will be there along the way to help you



Can you Get Good?
